problem.p: How many ways can we divide 12 people into:

ul.li: three disjoint 4-person groups when the order of the groups matters, for example each group will perform a different task,
three disoint 4-person groups when the order of the groups does not matter,
three disjoint groups with 3,4 and 5 people,
three disjoint groups with 3,3 and 6 people, when the order of the groups does not matter?
